segments.text: I'm calling to ask about your apartment advertised .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we've got great apartments with charming environment and nice scenery . And they are all newly renovated .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds fantastic ! But I am looking for something closer to the downtown , as I spend most of my time at the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We have a nice apartment located near the Oriental Square . It's perfect for people busy with office work . It is fully furnished with a service staff taking care of the trivial details .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure it is wonderful , but I need an unfurnished apartment with relatively lower cost .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah ! I get your point . We have just what you need . Our Jinyuan apartments have several floor plans . The one bedroom apartments are very economical , but their layout makes great use of a small amount of space . I think you can find the right apartment there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! I'll arrange a viewing after work tomorrow afternoon . Could you tell me the detailed address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's just at 19 Lingual Road . You can phone me again if you cann't find the right place .
segments.speaker: S2
